roleset.name: ensure something stays below a certain level, cap, keep below a ceratin level

example.name: unmentioned limit
example.text: The new company will attempt to limit the shipyard 's losses , participants said .

example.name: with limit
example.text: And powerful political pressures may convince the Conservative government to keep its so-called golden share , which limits any individual holding to 15 % , until the restriction expires on Dec. 31 , 1990 .

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Due to this the US and EU have imposed sanctions on Iran involving limits on the oil bought from Iran which in turn decreases their economy and other sanctions of similar consequences .

propbank.arg: on the oil bought from Iran
which in turn decreases their economy

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: Likewise one may be critical of his limitation of the role given to sense - experience in his account of knowledge and truth as the counterpart of his appeal to divine illumination .

propbank.arg: of the role given to sense - experience in his account of knowledge and truth as the counterpart of his appeal to divine illumination

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: The MRI of the left thigh and pelvis is extremely limited

propbank.arg: The MRI of the left thigh and pelvis

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: We limit our boasting to the work that is ours .

propbank.arg: to the work that is ours

example.name: Cause as arg 0
example.text: Information today is limited due to lack of results

roleset.note: LIMIT-V NOTES: Ignore adjectival usages like"a limited partnership". (from limit.01-v)
LIMIT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on limit-v.01, WordNet sense # . Corresponds to VNcls limit-76. (from limit.01-n)
LIMITED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to limit.01. Limit.01 is a member of VN class limit-76. Framed by Katie. (from limited.01-j)
Try to stick to instances that can in some way be construed as referring to the event of limiting, rather than the number benchmark itself. (from limit.01-n)
